resources.title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
resources.description: The bible for data engineers. Covers distributed systems, databases, and data processing fundamentals. A must-read that will change how you think about data systems.

resources.title: The Data Warehouse Toolkit (3rd Edition)
resources.description: The definitive guide to dimensional modeling by Ralph Kimball. Essential for understanding star schemas, fact tables, and dimension design patterns.

resources.title: Fundamentals of Data Engineering
resources.description: Comprehensive overview of the modern data engineering landscape by Joe Reis and Matt Housley. Great starting point for understanding the field.

resources.title: Data Engineering with Python
resources.description: Practical guide to building data pipelines with Python. Covers Airflow, Spark, and cloud platforms with hands-on examples.

resources.title: Streaming Systems (O'Reilly)
resources.description: Deep dive into streaming data processing by the creators of Apache Beam. Essential for understanding windowing, watermarks, and exactly-once semantics.

resources.title: Learning Spark (2nd Edition)
resources.description: Comprehensive guide to Apache Spark 3.0 including Spark SQL, Structured Streaming, and MLlib. Written by Databricks engineers.

resources.title: Kafka: The Definitive Guide (2nd Edition)
resources.description: Everything you need to know about Apache Kafka from the team at Confluent. Covers architecture, producers, consumers, and Kafka Streams.

resources.title: DataTalks.Club Data Engineering Zoomcamp
resources.description: Free, comprehensive 9-week data engineering course with hands-on projects. Covers Docker, Terraform, GCP, Spark, Kafka, and dbt.

resources.title: dbt Learn (Official Courses)
resources.description: Official dbt courses including Fundamentals, Advanced Materializations, and Jinja. Free certification upon completion.

resources.title: Confluent Kafka Courses
resources.description: Free Kafka courses from Confluent covering fundamentals, Kafka Streams, ksqlDB, and Kafka Connect. Industry-standard training.

resources.title: AWS Data Engineering Learning Path
resources.description: Official AWS training for data analytics and engineering. Includes free digital courses and paid instructor-led options.

resources.title: Google Cloud Data Engineering Path
resources.description: Google Cloud training path covering BigQuery, Dataflow, and Pub/Sub. Includes hands-on labs on Qwiklabs.

resources.title: Databricks Academy
resources.description: Free courses on Spark, Delta Lake, and Lakehouse architecture from Databricks. Excellent for learning modern data platform concepts.

resources.title: Stanford CS246: Mining Massive Datasets
resources.description: Stanford course on algorithms for large-scale data processing. Covers MapReduce, recommendation systems, and clustering.

resources.title: Apache Airflow Documentation
resources.description: Official Airflow documentation with tutorials, how-to guides, and best practices. Essential reference for orchestration.

resources.title: Apache Spark Documentation
resources.description: Official Spark documentation covering Spark SQL, Structured Streaming, MLlib, and GraphX.

resources.title: Confluent Documentation
resources.description: Comprehensive Kafka documentation including Schema Registry, Kafka Connect, and ksqlDB tutorials.

resources.title: dbt Documentation
resources.description: Official dbt docs covering models, tests, macros, packages, and best practices. Excellent getting started guide.

resources.title: Delta Lake Documentation
resources.description: Official Delta Lake docs covering ACID transactions, time travel, schema evolution, and optimization.

resources.title: Great Expectations Documentation
resources.description: Documentation for Great Expectations data quality framework. Covers expectations, checkpoints, and data docs.

resources.title: Terraform AWS Provider Docs
resources.description: Reference documentation for all AWS resources in Terraform. Essential for infrastructure as code.

resources.title: DataTalks.Club Slack
resources.description: Active community of 50k+ data professionals. Channels for DE, ML, analytics, and career advice. Very helpful for beginners.

resources.title: r/dataengineering
resources.description: Reddit community with 200k+ members discussing tools, career advice, and industry trends.

resources.title: dbt Community Slack
resources.description: 50k+ member Slack community for dbt users. Great for getting help and learning best practices.

resources.title: Data Engineering Weekly Newsletter
resources.description: Weekly newsletter covering data engineering news, tools, and tutorials. Great way to stay current.

resources.title: Seattle Data Guy Blog
resources.description: Blog and YouTube channel with practical data engineering content. Great explanations of complex topics.

resources.title: AWS Certified Data Engineer - Associate
resources.description: AWS certification validating skills in data ingestion, transformation, orchestration, and security on AWS.

resources.title: Google Professional Data Engineer
resources.description: GCP certification covering BigQuery, Dataflow, Pub/Sub, and ML on GCP. Highly respected in industry.

resources.title: Databricks Certified Data Engineer Associate
resources.description: Validates skills in Spark, Delta Lake, and lakehouse architecture. Good for Databricks-heavy shops.

resources.title: Snowflake SnowPro Core Certification
resources.description: Foundational Snowflake certification covering architecture, data loading, and virtual warehouses.

resources.title: Mode SQL Tutorial
resources.description: Excellent free SQL tutorial from basics to advanced. Covers window functions, CTEs, and performance.

resources.title: SQLBolt - Interactive SQL Lessons
resources.description: Interactive SQL lessons with in-browser exercises. Great for beginners learning SQL fundamentals.

resources.title: LeetCode SQL Problems
resources.description: SQL practice problems from easy to hard. Essential for interview preparation.

resources.title: DataGrip (JetBrains)
resources.description: Powerful database IDE supporting multiple databases. Great for SQL development and data exploration.

resources.title: DBeaver Community Edition
resources.description: Free, open-source database tool supporting 80+ databases. Good alternative to paid tools.

resources.title: Postman
resources.description: API development and testing tool. Essential for working with REST APIs in ETL pipelines.

resources.title: Docker Desktop
resources.description: Container runtime for local development. Essential for running Kafka, Airflow, and other tools locally.

resources.title: NYC Taxi Dataset
resources.description: Billions of taxi trip records. The classic dataset for learning big data processing.

resources.title: Kaggle Datasets
resources.description: Thousands of free datasets for practice projects. Good for building portfolio projects.

resources.title: Draw.io (diagrams.net)
resources.description: Free diagramming tool for creating architecture diagrams, data flow diagrams, and ERDs.
